#### Dataset description

* The melanoma dataset:

The "melanoma" data set is a cohort of stage M1c patients with RAS or RAF mutations with drug resistance compared to those who are drug sensitive processed from the cBioPortal (https://www.cbioportal.org/study/summary?id=skcm_mskcc_2014) using DEseq2 library (https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/DESeq2.html).

* The UALCAN dataset:

The collection of both top 250 over-expressed genes and top 250 under-expressed genes from each cancer type from UALCAN [https://ualcan.path.uab.edu/] (https://ualcan.path.uab.edu/)
